definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: He entered Harward University, a university that many people dream of.
sentences.chinese: 他考取了哈佛大學，一所許多人都向往的大學。

sentences.english: Yu Kongjian received a doctor degree in Design from Harvard University, the USin 1995.
sentences.chinese: 1995年在美國哈佛大學獲設計學博士學位。

sentences.english: Dr Matthew Stephenson, Assistant Professor, Harvard Law School.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬森馬修博士，助理教授，哈佛大學法學院。

sentences.english: And, after all, we are Harvard so we know.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我們是哈佛的，所以我們知道。

sentences.english: He attended Harvard University in Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 他上了麻州的哈佛大學。

sentences.english: Someday, he hopes to continue his studies at Harvard University .
sentences.chinese: 他希望會有那麼一天可以在哈佛大學繼續研讀。

sentences.english: 1900-1907 attended Harvard University and Columbia University.
sentences.chinese: 1907年哈佛大學和哥倫比亞大學。

sentences.english: The scene of the GREs held at Harvard.
sentences.chinese: 這是哈佛大學舉辦GRE考試的盛況。

sentences.english: The Harvard-Yenching Library founded by him has become a treasure house for Chinese studies.
sentences.chinese: 他創建的哈佛燕京圖書館，成爲西方漢學研究的寶庫。
他在哈佛大學獲得博士學位。

sentences.english: The Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies at Harvard sponsored the conference.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大學費正清中國研究中心贊助了此次會議。

sentences.english: As known, the study in Harvord is quite stressfull.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，哈佛大學裏學習非常緊張。

sentences.english: For example, Harvard College is the undergraduate part of Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 例如，哈佛學院就是哈佛大學的本科部分。

sentences.english: For example, Harvard College is the undergraduate part of Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 例如，哈佛學院就是哈佛大學的本科部分。

sentences.english: I have HBSHavard Business School) in my crosshair .
sentences.chinese: 我的目標就是上哈佛商學院。

sentences.english: Harvard is a world-famous institution of higher learning, attracting the best minds and bringing them up generation after generation.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛是世界著名的高等學府，精英薈萃，人才輩出。

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2
